app.title: Enigma Desktop Copilot
app.tagline: Personal desktop copilot for focused workflows

analytics.timelineDescription: Distribution of insights captured across the day.
analytics.confidenceDescription: How confident Enigma is about its recent insights.
analytics.categoryDescription: Where Enigma spends the most attention during your sessions.

activity.title: Desktop activity timeline
activity.description: Review the observations generated by Enigma to understand your workflow patterns.
activity.emptyState: No activity recorded for the selected period.

actions.title: Copilot action catalog
actions.description: Discover what Enigma can automate or accelerate on your behalf while keeping you in control.

guidance.title: Guided insights
guidance.description: Rapid answers and proactive nudges that keep you focused.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Hands-free actions that streamline repetitive laptop work.

safety.title: Safety & trust
safety.description: Controls that keep your data private and compliant.

dailyBrief.name: Daily briefing
dailyBrief.description: Summarizes overnight updates, calendar context, and critical alerts before you begin.

contextSummary.name: Context summary
contextSummary.description: Produces on-demand summaries of the active window, chat thread, or document.

focusPlan.name: Focus plan
focusPlan.description: Creates a short action plan with timers and reminders for your current task list.

browserAutomation.name: Browser automation
browserAutomation.description: Opens the preferred browser, navigates to destinations, and performs scripted actions.

workspacePreparation.name: Workspace prep
workspacePreparation.description: Launches applications, restores layouts, and readies resources for recurring workflows.

meetingNotes.name: Meeting notes
meetingNotes.description: Captures audio or screen context and drafts structured meeting notes for review.

privacyReview.name: Privacy review
privacyReview.description: Highlights windows and data that should be masked before sharing your screen.

policyGuardrails.name: Policy guardrails
policyGuardrails.description: Applies enterprise policies to automation runs and blocks risky operations.

networkStatus.name: Network status
networkStatus.description: Checks connectivity, proxy health, and reports outages impacting automations.

playbook.title: How actions execute
playbook.description: Every action follows a transparent loop so you can monitor progress or intervene.

observe.title: Observe
observe.description: Capture signals from your desktop activity, telemetry, and prompts.

plan.title: Plan
plan.description: Draft a clear sequence of steps with guardrails tailored to your policies.

execute.title: Execute
execute.description: Automate or assist with each step, reporting back outcomes and next moves.

settings.title: LLM & experience settings
settings.description: Configure the OpenAI compatible endpoint and tune Enigma to your preferences.

account.title: Account profile
account.description: Personalize how Enigma represents you during automations.

llm.title: LLM configuration
llm.description: Control how Enigma connects to your preferred language model provider.

network.title: Network & trust
network.description: Adjust connectivity, proxy, and certificate preferences.

automation.title: Automation surface
automation.description: Choose how Enigma automates across browsers and desktop contexts.

hints.model: Model identifier supported by your provider
hints.organization: Optional organization header for OpenAI APIs
hints.language: Select the language used across the interface
hints.desktopCaptureEnabled: Allow Enigma to summarize what happens on screen
hints.activityLogging: Maintain a local timeline of Enigma insights
hints.displayName: Used in summaries and action confirmations
hints.avatarUrl: Link to an image used when representing your account
hints.preferredLLMVendor: Influences headers and defaults for compatible APIs
hints.requestTimeoutSeconds: Increase if your LLM server responds slowly
hints.maxRetries: Number of retry attempts before reporting a failure
hints.networkProxy: Proxy URL applied to outbound LLM traffic
hints.allowUntrustedCertificates: Allow self-signed certificates for internal networks
hints.automationBrowser: Which browser Enigma should control for automations
hints.browserProfilePath: Optional profile path for persistent sessions
hints.backgroundAutomation: Enable automations to run when the window is minimized

prompts.missingBaseUrl: Enter a base URL before testing the connection
